summary: The module provides a PyTorch Lightning example that implements a generative adversarial network (GAN) for MNIST digit synthesis. It defines configurable generator and discriminator models, a LightningModule that coordinates adversarial training, and a command‑line interface to launch training and monitor generated images with TensorBoard.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑run template that accelerates development and experimentation with GANs, enabling developers and researchers to prototype image generation workflows using PyTorch Lightning and visualize results in real time.
